title: (x) More Better - CP Company {David H}
content:
What is the font used here -   
   
 [http://www.more-better.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110030445/http:/www.more-better.com/)   
   
And where can I buy it?   
   
Thanks muchly!
author: mcmagics

comments.content:
That would be ' [CP Company](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110030445/http:/www.fsd.it/fonts/cp.htm)', by [Fabrizio Schiavi](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110030445/http:/www.fsd.it/)..   
_( Its available from [FSD](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110030445/http:/www.fsd.it/fonts/cp.htm) or [myFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110030445/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fsd/cp-company/).. And, its even on sale, right now.. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110030445im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) )_

wow what a quick reply! Cheers David Hubner! im Dusting off the credit card...   
   
Just checked out your website and formlos pimp has style! good work fella
